attributes.action: Award legendary entertainer Max Bygraves a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Max Bygraves is one of the UKs greatest entertainers. Born in 1922 he has had one of the longest and most succesful careers of any UK artiste. He has performed at more Royal Variety Performances than anyone else, entertained troops and has been a wonderful ambassador for the country.

Please consider Mr Bygraves for a knighthood.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
